name: Stranger Monster
description:
A simple 2D stealth game.

Its concept and worldview is taken from my previous game "Frown Tako".

Summary:

You are a pretty rare stranger monster,

every trainer all want to catch you.

Be a stranger monster to fight against your fate.

Controls:
  • Direction key to move.
  • Jumping will make you temporarily dizzy, be careful!
  • You can interactive with some item on level.
  • Water is good, and you very enjoy it.
  Resources:

Art and music used from https://canarigames.itch.io/canaripack-8bit-topdown

SFC used from  https://taira-komori.jpn.org/freesound.html

Thanks for you providing these awesome resources and materials.

And thanks for your playing.
